title: The Sport parade: ski revels
brief_description: Cinemagazine item about life on a ski field, from the snowplows that clear the roads to the field through to the actual skiing. Shows amateurs and professionals, old-fashioned horse drawn skiing, modern ski lifts, skiing with wings (ie for transport) and the practical uses of skiing.
